channel.title: What is faster between these two methods of opening doors?
channel.description:
I don't know which one is faster on run time, what do you guys think?
Method one: Loading doors from a .txt like PI does it now.
Method two: Make a task to open the door (delete the door and then spawn another one in its spot, facing a different way) everytime someone clicks on the object.
I need to use method two for one door in a quest and I wasn't sure if I should make all doors like that.

item.title: What is faster between these two methods of opening doors?
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I should keep method one

Read full topic
item.source: What is faster between these two methods of opening doors?
